alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Geneva, Houston, northwestern Jackson, northern Walton, Holmes, north central Washington and southwestern Early Counties through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 210 PM EDT/110 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cowarts to 6 miles southeast of Geneva to near Crestview. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Graceville, Dothan, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Centerville and Malone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT/500 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
